content: tickle me red with this free elmo hat crochet pattern made with eyelash yarn and paired with worsted weight acrylic yarn it creates that fun muppet-like fuzzy texture fun to wear fun to make this is part of my furry character hat series and perfect to crochet and make if you need any costumes or funny photo props happy crocheting and tickling p s the elmo crochet tutorial 1 is also available on my youtube channel see the hat in action and you can also crochet along with me ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **level** easy **need to know ** single_crochet in the round how to increase and decrease ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ i d love to see how your project turns out make sure to tag me on… **instagram ** @ami_amour 2 **facebook** ami amour 3 1 https //youtu be/3g1jysn7f00 2 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 3 https //www facebook com/amiamourfan
